feed.title: Of Unproven Words And Code
feed.subtitle: A blog about solo game development and coding in general

entry.title: Making a game with Go: #0 Introduction
entry.summary: This is an introductory issue about the goals, choices and challenges of my new quest: making a game in Linux with a framework and not an engine. Here in issue #0 I will explain the whys, the hows and the don'ts and starting from the next issue I will write a tutorial alongside an open source game hosted on Github. I hope you follow me along.

entry.title: Introducing Glyph: Static Site Generator Powered by Github Issues and Pages
entry.summary: Another blog and another static site generator? In 2018? I know what you think but please read a few lines first if you made it this far. This one is a little different from previous static site generators.. I promise! Oh and by the way, you are just reading a Github issue!

entry.title: Glyph Theme Test Issue
entry.summary: While being the first issue of this blog this entry exists just to demonstrate the currently applied Glyph theme. The content shown in this issue is taken from here and aims to provide a complete markdown overview.
